auth/internal-error: Sorry, we had an internal error on our side. Please try again.
auth/email-already-in-use: Sorry, this email is already in use. Please use another one.
auth/wrong-password: Sorry, your password is incorrect. Delete and try again.
auth/user-not-found: Sorry, this email does not have an account. Check the spelling and try again.
auth/too-many-requests: Sorry you have tried to many times to login. Please try again 1 hour.
default: Opps, we have no clue what happen. Reload the page and try again.
